name: Where it will take us (super-dena)
description:
“Love, mercy… That’s just words to justify our actions.

Maybe I should keep you from suffering and put you to death myself.”

------------------

Welcome to this story, my first interactive one. I needed a new challenge and decided to learn how to use twine and make a story a bit different than the “linear” one I’ve been used to.

As everyone putting something out in the public space, I think that this could be so much better, that I could have done this, and that, and also maybe that, so it would have been perfect. But as wise people say, done is better than perfect.

>English isn’t my first language, so I already apologize for any weird sentences or syntax.

>Good or bad, reviews are always good to take, so please let me know how I can do better next time :)

------------------

Trigger warning: physical and psychological violence, mention of suicide, mention of sexual intercourses and harassment, death, hunting description.

Cover photo by Andre Benz
